name: ZoneWise Supabase
tagline: Florida real estate intelligence database ‚Äî 67 counties, 808+ jurisdictions, 1,542+ zoning districts, 10.8M parcels
description: ZoneWise.AI's core data layer. PostgreSQL database via Supabase REST API containing zoning codes, dimensional standards, jurisdictions, overlay districts, and parcel-to-zone mappings for all 67 Florida counties.

tools.name: list_jurisdictions
tools.description: List Florida jurisdictions (cities, counties, CDPs). Filter by county name or minimum data completeness. Returns id, name, county, data_completeness, municode_url.

tools.name: search_jurisdictions
tools.description: Search jurisdictions by name. Use for finding a city or county when the user mentions a Florida location.

tools.name: list_zoning_districts
tools.description: List all zoning districts for a jurisdiction. Returns code, name, category. Use the jurisdiction_id from list_jurisdictions.

queryParams.name: category
queryParams.description: Category filter: Residential, Commercial, Industrial, Agricultural, Mixed-Use, Special

tools.name: get_zone_standards
tools.description: Get dimensional standards (setbacks, height, FAR, lot size) for a zoning district. Use the zoning_district id from list_zoning_districts.

queryParams.name: zoning_district_ids
queryParams.description: Multiple district IDs for batch lookup

tools.name: get_overlay_districts
tools.description: Get overlay districts (flood zones, historic districts, etc.) for a jurisdiction.

tools.name: lookup_parcel
tools.description: Look up zoning for a specific parcel by parcel ID or address.

queryParams.name: parcel_id
queryParams.description: BCPAO account number or county parcel ID

tools.name: count_records
tools.description: Count records in any table. Use Prefer: count=exact header.

tables.jurisdictions: 808+ Florida municipalities, counties, CDPs with data completeness scores and Municode URLs
tables.zoning_districts: 1,542+ zoning classifications with codes, names, categories linked to jurisdictions
tables.zone_standards: Dimensional standards: setbacks (front/side/rear), height limits, FAR, lot coverage, density
tables.overlay_districts: Special overlay zones (historic, flood, etc.) with additional restrictions
tables.parcel_zones: Parcel-to-zone mappings with addresses for direct property lookups

queryPatterns.joinTables: Use jurisdiction_id to chain: jurisdictions ‚Üí zoning_districts ‚Üí zone_standards

notes: Supabase REST API uses PostgREST query syntax
ilike = case-insensitive LIKE, use %25 for URL-encoded %
eq = exact match, gte = greater than or equal, in = set membership
Always include select= to limit response fields for performance
Use Prefer: count=exact header to get row counts without full data
